events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car on Main Street causing major front-end damage.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to description of vehicle collision and damages.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim for follow-up and processing.
Acknowledgment sent to customer confirming receipt of auto accident claim and next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driverâ€™s license for claim verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident report and vehicle damage photographs.
Investigation into the circumstances and liability of the car accident has commenced as scheduled.
Investigation determined the accident was caused by another driver; customer not at fault.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the service.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriter following customer agreement to the settlement.
Payment for the settled amount was processed and sent to the customer's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been closed after successful payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
Claim files have been archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference as per policy.
